item.title: Goreway PS generation 2010-2018
item.description: Generation data downloaded from IESO site ( http://www.ieso.ca/en/Power-Data/Data-Directory) library(rlang) library(tidyverse) library(lubridate) library(zoo) library(readxl) library(plotly) G10<-read_excel("Output/GOC-2010.xlsx") ## New names: ## * `` -> ...3 head(G10,n=5) # Head gives the first five rows of the data . Its gives generating units available . ## # A tibble: 5 x 114 ## DATE HOUR ...3 ABKENORA AGUASABON ALEXANDER AMARANTH ## <dttm> <dbl> <lgl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> ## 1 2010-01-01 00:00:00 1 NA 14 2 54 18 ## 2 2010-01-01 00:00:00 2 NA 14 19 54 15 ## 3 2010-01-01 00:00:00 3 NA 14 26 54 19 ## 4 2010-01-01 00:00:00 4 NA 14 26 54 25 ## 5 2010-01-01 00:00:00 5 NA 13 26 53 33 ## # .

item.title: Ontario Energy Data Analysis - 2018
item.description: Ontario Energy Data Analysis - 2018 Data Collection Library used during analysis Ontario Demand Ontario Generation Date Format and Summary Function Daily average generation Ontario HOEP (Hour Ontario Electricity Price) Ontario Natural Gas Price US($) Temperature Data Preparation Round digits to two decimal Filling NA with mean values Combine monthly temperaure( rbind) Data Preparation Checking Missing Values Filling Missing Values Converting the Column data into single row ( Using gather) Converting Blank cell with NA.
